steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to align.
Go to the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Paragraph' section, click on the 'Align Left' button to align the text to the left.
Alternatively, you can click on the 'Align Center' button to align the text to the center, or the 'Align Right' button to align the text to the right.
To justify the text, click on the 'Justify' button.
To align the text vertically, click on the 'Align Text' button and choose the desired alignment option.
Save the changes to the document.
